extendedInfo.description: Search for products in the LCBO (Liquor Control Board of Ontario) stores. Find the locations that have the product you are looking for. Only useful in Ontario.This is not a store locator.  It will locate the closest stores to you after you select your product (if it has the product!)Ads can be turned off through the entry screen's menu.Please email me any issues or requests

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: I would really like to have an app for the LCBO that actually does something. 40 Creek and Forty Creek come up dry. Not quite unusable but certainly almost useless
reviews.author: Kevin Papineau

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Fast, simple and very useful.  One wish, displaying the Lcbo product code for the item would be great.
reviews.author: David Watson

reviews.title: Not pretty, but does the job
reviews.comment: It\'s not the prettiest app, plain text, long search results lists.  But if you spell your product name correctly it\'ll narrow it down nicely and lets you know how many are available at stores in your general vicinity.  So, it does what it says it does.  And yes, it does partial searches, but you may get hundreds of results.
reviews.author: Jason Burroughs

reviews.title: MUST HAVE
reviews.comment: Better than I expected. Works like a charm. I strongly recommend this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Would be nice to have an option to call a location, not just open a map.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok app
reviews.comment: Needa product id search, would be nice if search results include tasting notes just like on lcbo website
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t search partial names
reviews.comment: what good is a search that can\'t search partial names
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lousy search engine
reviews.comment: Nothing came up on 3 basic searches? One test was Smirnoff.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lcbo search
reviews.comment: Excellent
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best app ever, works very well looking forward to a gps add on keep the updates rolling!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good for what it is, but needs a wider range of search options and more accurate linking to store locations via Google maps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs to support higher res screens and be location aware
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Location based searches or at least remembering a default location (rather than constantly entering it) would be huge
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Barely adequate
reviews.comment: Not nearly as good as the LCBO\'s own app that runs on iphone but adequate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love comparing prices on all their products without going into the store. App works perfectly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Force close all the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: \342\200\242 Clunky interface.  \342\200\242 Annoying ads \342\200\246 (but aren\'t they all?)  I was looking for an app to allow store inventory searches using the product LCBO Item Number.
reviews.author: cyn b

reviews.comment: Good app, implement GPS seemlessly in future release?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lot of things need to be done, 4 stars for potential.  Needs to integrate maps and \'my location\' as well as store location. Good start though
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does exactly as it says, faster than anything else. Search for a product, and it tells You where and how many. Simply amazing in a pinch.
reviews.author: A Google User
